channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Elon Musk Beware: Rimac Is Doing Auto Taxis Too With New Verne Brand
item.description: Electric hypercar pioneer Rimac is turning to autonomous vehicles with its Verne launch. Can its unique approach succeed in an increasingly crowded se...

item.title: The paradox of self skepticism
item.description: If we’re to publish, teach, invent, imagine or promote, we need the confidence to believe that we have something to offer. That we are, in some way, r...

item.title: Samsung VP James Kitto Interview: The Union Of Qualcomm’s ARM, Windows’ AI And Samsung’s Galaxy Book4 Edge
item.description: The Galaxy Book4 Edge is one of the first Copilot+PC laptops. What benefits could Samsung's union of Windows, ARM, and AI offer?

item.title: Return on effort
item.description: It’s a pretty simple calculation. How much value per dollar does a freelancer produce for you? What’s the psychic reward for the time you put into you...

item.title: ‘Beyblade’ Is Bouncing Back With Its Latest Iteration ‘Beyblade X’
item.description: At the end of the 90s, 'Beyblade' was all the rage, but I didn’t realize until recently just how massive this spinning top juggernaut really is.

item.title: Leprechauns
item.description: Is there a rainbow underneath your pot of gold? Sometimes, we get it backwards.

item.title: Obsbot Launches The Tiny 2 Lite – A PTZ Webcam With 4K Sensor
item.description: The Tiny 2 Lite webcam from OBSBOT can pan tilt and zoom. It has a large sensor and two microphones. AI algorithms offer human tracking so the subject...

item.title: Assume lack of context
item.description: The person you’re working with might not know what you know, might not see what you see. It’s tempting to begin where we are. But it’s more useful to ...

item.title: Ultimate Ears EVERBOOM Is A Bluetooth Speaker To Get Excited Over
item.description: This rugged and portable Bluetooth speaker from Logitech brand Ultimate Ears has a superb sound and can go almost anywhere.

item.title: The Coney Island problem
